item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Zelenskyy sacks air force chief after top pilot killed in F-16 crash
2. Sotheby’s earnings plunge as art market catches a chill
3. Trump says he will vote against abortion rights in Florida
4. Eton College to pass on full cost of VAT on fees to parents
5. Economist Eugene Fama: ‘Efficient markets is a hypothesis. It’s not reality’
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
